Title: Provides alternative pricing methods in the sale and offering of funeral merchandise and services
Summary: Provides alternative pricing methods in the sale and offering of funeral merchandise and services; mandates a report by the consumer protection division on the effectiveness of alternative pricing methods.
LawCode: Amd ยง3440-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the alternative pricing methods in the sale and offering of funeral merchandise and services; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
